front.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard-Telecommunications and exchange between information technology systems — Requirements for local and metropolitan area networks — Part 1Q: Bridges and bridged networks AMENDMENT 2: YANG data model

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: A YANG data model in support of configuration and operational status information for a subset of Bridging capabilities is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q(TM)-2018.
